playerprofile.name: Chris Sale, LHP #41
playerprofile.quote: The ace is ready to experience the thrill of pitching in the World Series for the first time. Sale will try to avenge his laborious start in Game 1 of the ALCS. This will be his first matchup vs. the Dodgers since a 2012 no-decision in L.A.

playerprofile.name: Clayton Kershaw, LHP #22
playerprofile.quote: Kershaw employed his breaking balls masterfully while winning Game 5 and closing out Game 7 of the NLCS, and he got some extra prep work in the Fenway Park bullpen Sunday. The ace struck out 11 Astros while winning Game 1 of the 2017 World Series.
